mapper.insert: insert into t_board(article_seq, mb_id, default_name, plate_num, default_money, default_year, report_num, plate_location, admin_location, article_file1, article_file2, article_date) values(t_board.article_seq.nextval, #{mb_id}, #{default_name},#{plate_num}, #{default_money},#{default_year}, #{report_num},#{plate_location},#{admin_location},#{article_file1}, #{article_file2}, #{article_date})
